112.content:
Phineas Flynn half of the dynamic brother duo that can make anything awakens to find that he can't move his arms or legs. He's sees he's on a pink bed his wrists are tied together by jump rope and secured to the head board of the bed.The ten year old's ankles were tied together. He also sees he is shirtless. He looks to his right spotting his captor is none other than Isabella. This calmed him down he may be tied up but at least he was with a friend he trusted. Isabella knelt down at his right side.

"Hey Isabella, um why am I tied up?" Phineas curiously asked.

Isabella was a little nervous after all tied to her bed was her crush and knocking him out alone was nerve wracking. However Phineas's positive attitude put a smile on her face. Her hands gently glided across Phineas's bare belly making the boy release a loud and cute laugh from his mouth. She giggled at how cute at was and that Phineas must now have figured out her intentions.

"Isabella if you wanted to tickle me all you had to do was ask?" Phineas smiled.

He felt his face slightly blush. He loved being tickled infact he and his brother often have tickle fights.

"Well this was more fun." Isabella replied.

1141.content:
Candace looked at her little brother and was wracking her brain around how to knock him out. She didn't want to hurt him, but then got a great idea. She made him a glass of lemonade and sprinkled some sleep powder he made into it. She brought the lemonade out to Phineas who was about to start the latest project. She couldn't help but notice how cute Phineas was.

"Here you go little bro some lemonade." Candace smiled.

Phineas smiled and took the glass. He began to drink some.

"Thanks sis." Phineas smiled.

He then fell her older sister give his belly a quick tickle making him laugh. He liked getting tickled but was more surprised this came from Candace. He started feeling sleepy all of a sudden. Soon he fell on his back sleeping cutely.

Looking at Phineas like this she started to wonder why she was so obsessed with busting Phineas. She removed Phineas's shirt and picked him up. She really started to hate how she treated her brother like he was an annoyance to her. Whenever Phineas had a project he always invited her to play with. Phineas carved her face four times into mount Rushmore on her birthday for crying out loud. She brought Phineas up to her room. She layed him on her bed and got some rope. he tied his wrists above his head and his ankles together. Also tying a rope around his belly above his belly button securing him to the bed. Phineas began to wake up and noticed his position. Phineas sees Candace holding a feather.

"Where do you want it first little bro?" Candace grinned.

With a cute smile and playful gulp Phineas picks.

12.content: Who Is gonna tickle ferb?
12.title: Ferb

choices: They create a machine that has some fun ^^
1211.content:
Phineas was up early and walked down stairs he spotted a note on the fridge. He grabbed it and read it out loud. "Phieans and Ferb, your my mom, Candace and I are out at the movies, and errands. We will be back at dinner time. Be good please. Dad or Lawrence."

"Okay. We have the house to our selves... Now what?" Just then Ferb came down and glanced around he gave Phineas a look that said it all. Phineas, in response, handed Ferb a note. Ferb read it before placing it on the table and grabbing him and his brother some ceral.

They eat in silence. Trying to think of somthing to do. When they finsh eating, they head upstairs to get changed into there clothes. Phineas thought of an idea. He smiled. Ferb might turn what he wanted to do against him but he did not care. This would be fun and he would not let Ferb win.

12111.content:
As the step bros walk up to there room to get ready. Right before they started to get ther clothes out. Phineas tackled Ferb to his bed. Phineas was on top at the moment. He smiled down at ferb with a teasing glint in his eye. Ferb looked up at him confused. "Phineas. What are you doing?" Ferb, though quiet, would talk a lot when it came to his slightly younger step brother. (Only by a couple of months) He could chatter, and knowing how much... Reaction has to what Phineas has planned for him. He may really talk or laugh.

Phineas smiled. "I am just going to have some fun with seeing that you are tickilish!" Ferb flinch and struggled to get free. "Dont worry. You will be. Now Lets get started."

Without any other warning Phineas dug his fingers into Ferbs clothed smoatch. At once he howled in laughter. Ferb was insanley ticklish. He lay there. Giggling like no tommorow. Phineas paused and thought about where to strike next.

131111.title: Tied her to the bed so he could tickle other pa...

choices: She Tries to Call Her Mom and Succeeds
She Tries to Call Her Mom and Fails
13112.content:
Phineas then begins to scribble his fingers all over Candace's feet. "Wakey Wakey Sis." he chuckled as he tickled her soles.
She then began to stir and soon realized the situation she was in. "Phineas, get me out of this right now!" she angrily yelled.
"Somebody's still grumpy I see. Let's see if we can change that." he said with a grin on his face.
"Phineas, you better let me out right now or I'm telling mohahahahahahaham!" she said as Phineas began to tickle her feet again. He dug his fingers into her soles, making her squirm and burst into uncontrollable laughter. "Phihihihihneheheheas, stahahahahahahap!
"No can do Sis. You're always so grouchy; it's time for you to loosen up." he giggled as he continued his assault on her bare feet. She tried to get the blankets off her, but the duct tape over them made it impossible to escape. She realized that the only way out of this was telling her mom, but would she be able to..?
13112.title: tickled both of her feet vigourously and quickly.

131122.content:
"Phinihihihihieahahahahahas stahahahahahahahahap!" she begged as he continued to tickle her feet.
Sorry Sis, but I haven't seen you laugh like this in years, and I can't pass up an opportunity to tickle these big feet of yours." he replied with a wide grin on his face.
"Myhyhyhyhyhyhyhy feheheheheheet ahahahaharehehehen't thahahahahahat bihihihihihihihig" she screamed in a fit of laughter.
"Whatever you say. Either way, they're fun to tickle!" Phineas said, smiling as he continued to scribble his fingers all over her soles.
The tickling was becoming unbearable and Candace knew she had to do something fast. She knew that her mom was the only one who could put a stop to this seeing how Phineas was enjoying himself so much. With all of her remaining strength she called for the only person who could help her. "Maaaaaaaaaaaaam! Maaaaaaaam! Come see what Phineas is doing. Maaaaaaaam!" As she screamed for help, she noticed that Phineas stopped tickling her. She tried to look where he went, but couldn't see over the mound of blankets that were wrapped around her. She kept on calling for her mom, realizing that this would probably be her only chance to call for help.
"Someone's trying to escape I see," said Phineas, returning with a box full of tickle tools. "We'll just have to do something about that." He then went to Candace's laundry bin and took out one of her dirty socks. He then walked back over to her with an evil look on his face.
"This should keep you quiet."
"Phineas, don't you dare put that in my mouthmmmmmmmmmph!" she said as Phineas stuffed her dirty sock into her mouth. "Phimmmmmmmsh!" she screamed through her gag. "Lhhmmmt mmmm gmmmm!"
"You're still pretty loud. Sounds like you could use another sock." he chuckled. He walked back over to her laundry bin and took the other sock in the pair and proceeded to stuff the other dirty sock into her mouth, making sure to take up every nook and cranny in her mouth. "There, that should do it." he chuckled.
Cheeks bulging, Candace tried to say something, but all that came out were muffled screams. As she protested, the taste of her dirty socks spread throughout her mouth. Unfortunately for her, Phineas managed to choose the pair of gym socks that she wore for 2 weeks straight. She scrunched her nose as the stench from her socks filled her nostrils. "Why did I wear them for so long?" she thought to herself, trying to block out the smell, but to no avail.
"Don't think I forgot about those feet of yours, Sis" Phineas said with an evil grin on his face. "I brought some things that might make this more fun! Now, what should I use first?"
131122.title: She Tries to Call Her Mom and Fails

choices: Ignore the thought and prepare her right foot for the same treatment
1311222.content:
"Ah, I know!" Phineas said eagerly, grabbing his sister's pink hairbrush.

"Mmfffh! Nnph!" Candace yelled and begged through her gag, but to no avail. Phineas held both of her big toes together with his left hand as he mercilessly scrubbed up and down his sister's bare soles with the brush. Candace bucked and screamed violently, thrashing about the bed as her brother's tickle onslaught continued with no signs of stopping.

"MMMMFFFPPHHHH!" Candace screamed into her socks. The tickling sensation was unbearable for her. It felt like a million tiny cleats dancing up her arches and back down her soles at the speed of light. Candace was laughing and screaming so hard that she managed to eject the socks from her mouth.

"PHINEHEHEHEAAAAASSSSSHAHAHAHAHA STOOHOHOHOHOPIHIHIHITTTTTTTTTT!" Candace was flailing around in her binds, unable to escape the wrath of the hairbrush attacking her poor ticklish feet.

"Sorry sis, but you asked for it!" Phineas said, now grabbing a second hairbrush and raking both across her feet in unison, sending Candace into hysterics.

"GEHEHEHET THE FUCK OFF OF ME PHINEHEHEASSS!" Candace shrieked at the top of her lungs, the sudden swear causing Phineas to stop his tickle torture abruptly.

"Sis, you aren't allowed to use that language in this house!" Phineas said, disappointingly, "I guess I'll have to teach you even more of a lesson, huh?"

"Phineas, what do you-" Candace's sentenced stopped short when she saw what her brother had in her hands. A thick, long string, duct tape, electric toothbrushes, and baby oil.

"Hey bro, let's think about this..." Candace said, nervously, realizing how bad she was about to get it.

"You know the rules. Now you're REALLY gonna get it!" Phineas began setting up his big plan. He took the string and expertly tied it, wrapping each toe and typing it to her upper legs, so that each toe was both spread and held back.

"How bad does this tickle?" Phineas asked, as he turned on one of the toothbrushes and ran it between her middle and ring toe on her left foot.

"EEEEEEEEK!" Candace squealed at the ticklish sensation that had passed between her extra sensitive toes. She could not wiggle or move her feet any longer, as they were tied back. Her soft, bare, large, insanely ticklish feet were now at the mercy of her annoying little brother.

"Hehe, good." Phineas smirked, and initiated Phase 2 of his plan. Phineas took the bottle of baby oil and rubbed its contents onto her sister's left foot, coating every inch. Then, he took the now turned off electric toothbrushes and situated them all between each of her sister's toes. The feeling of the bristles even touching the spaces between her toes made her shudder. Phineas then taped each brush in place, so that way no movement could shake the brushes from their placement. He was about do the same with her right foot, but then he got a devilish idea.

"I bet my tongue would work wonders," Phineas thought, "but should I just stick to the original plan?"
1311222.title: Hairbrush

13112221.content:
"Well, before I do that, I should at least turn on the other half." Phineas thought.

He grabbed a special invention he had hidden with him, the TickleBot, which he had specifically deigned for this purpose. It was a small box with a mechanical hand attached by a long spring. He put the hairbrush into the hand of the hand of the robot, and it awaited its masters orders.

"Alright sis, you ready for this?" Phineas asked.

"Phineas, please don't! I'm begging you! I'm too ticklish!" Candace pleaded, but to no avail, as her brother ignored her and began flipping on each of the electric toothbrushes.

He turned on the first one, placed between her big toe and her index toe. "Phineas ple-hehehe nooo-"

He turned on the second one, placed between her index toe and her middle toe. "Hehehe Phineas turn it ohohohohoff-"

He turned on the third one, placed between her middle toe and her ring toe. "HeheHEY stAhaP-"

He turned on the final brush, placed between her ring toe and her pinky toe, nearly completing his relentless assault on her singular foot. "STOPIHIHI-"

"Okay TickleBot, attack!" Phineas commanded his robot as it began to vigorously brush up and down Candace's left foot, sending the poor girl back into another hysterical tickle-meltdown.

"PHINEHEHEAS OH MY GOD TURN IT OHOHOHOHOFFFFFF!" Candace bucked and yelled from the torment her left foot was receiving. She thought it couldn't get any worse, until she felt a slick, slimy object slowly drag itself up her right foot.

"WHAHAHAHAT THE FUCK IS THAHAHAHAT?!" Candace's laughed reached a new octave as Phineas' tongue slowly creeped its way up his sister's large foot. He flicked it back and forth as he went from the heel to the balls of her feet, swirling his tongue around the ball of her foot.

"Wow Candace, they almost taste like strawberry!" Phineas said, "Are your toes like lolipops?"

Phineas worked his tongue up his sister's right foot even more, now running his tongue across the pads of her toes and the undersides of them. He shoved the majority of her plump toes into his mouth and swirled his tongue around with reckless abandon, making sure his tongue definitely entered the spaces between these toes, much like the toothbrushes swirling on the other foot. He reached his free hands up and began scratching and scribbling all over Candace's right foot, his slick saliva allowing his hands to glide across her soles, creating even more of ticklish feeling that could only be described as agonizing.

"I CAHAHAHAN'T FUCKING TAKE IT ANYMOHOHOHOHOREEEE! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA GET THE FUCK OFF OF MY FUCKING FEET!" Tears flooded down Candace's cheeks as she reached her limit, the tickling becoming an indescribable sensation that broke her. The swirling bristles taped between her toes, the relentless hairbrush assaulting her left sole, and her brother torturing her right foot with his mouth and hands, all of it was too much.
13112221.title: Lickle her right foot

choices: Isabella is sleeping over at Gretchen's house
Gretchen asks to try to earn the 'Tickled Senseless' Patch
154111.content: What is going on when it happens?
154111.title: Isabella

1541111.content:
Gretchen sat impatiently on the couch sitting in her living room. She was waiting for her friend Isabella to arrive for their sleepover.

Finally, Isabella knocked at the door, and the girl with the glasses let her in.

"I brought Pinky with me. I hope you don't mind." Isabella asked.

Gretchen shook her head. "No. My parents aren't home, so there's no one to bother."

Smiling, Isabella looked at Gretchen's feet. She was wearing warm looking slippers with a pair of light blue socks covering her small feet. Isabella curled up her toes, and looked at her own feet. She was wearing her thin pink shoes over her new hot-pink socks around her highly sensitive feet.

Looking up, Isabella noticed that Gretchen was staring down at her guest's feet. Pretending not to notice, Isabella spoke.

"So what do you wanna do?"
1541111.title: Isabella is sleeping over at Gretchen's house

1541112.content:
"Are you sure about this, Gretchen?" Isabella asked.

Gretchen nodded.

The girl was sitting down. Her arms were tied above her head, and she was wearing a tank top, so her underarms were fully exposed. Her shirt was rolled up a bit so her belly and sides were vulnerable. Her socked feet were also placed in a set of stocks in front of her.

"Alright," Isabella said to her, "till you're tickled senseless."

"Wait, I get to tickle you after this, right?" Gretchen asked, nervous.

Isabella hesitated, then decided upon it. "Alright. You can tickle me then."

Isabella sat down next to Gretchen, and scrambled her fingers all over Gretchen's...
1541112.title: Gretchen asks to try to earn the 'Tickled S...

15411122.content:
Putting her wiggling fingers onto Gretchen's soles, the girl giggled loudly.

"Ahahahahahahahaha! Oh come ohohohohohon! Nohohohohot there! Hahahahaha!"

Isabella ceased the assault for a moment, only to grab Gretchen's big toe and wiggle her finger under it.

"This little piggy went to market..."

"NOHOHOHOHOHOHO!!! Isabehehehellahaha! Plehehehehease! Anythihihihihing but thahahahahat!!!"

"This little piggy stayed home."

"I'm too ticklish there! AHHAHAHAHAHAAHAH!!!"

"This little piggy had roast beef."

"PLEASE!!! Dohohohon't tickle my toes!!! Heeheeheehee!!!

"This little piggy had none."

"Please! I'm begging yohoohoohoohoo!!!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHAHA!!!!"

Isabella took Gretchen's small toe, tickled it, and put her fingers rapidly all over her sole, heel, and toes.

"And THIS little piggy went 'WEE WEE WEE' all the way home!!!"

"BWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH AHAHHAAHAHAHAHAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Isabella let up, thinking, while Gretchen gasped for air.

'I wonder...'

Isabella slipped off Gretchen's sock, and slowly dragged her tongue across her smooth bare foot.

"Geeheeheeheeheeheeheeheehee!"
15411122.title: Feet
